effect: • If this unit has 2 Pillage tokens, it gains **Precision**.
• If the Defender rolls a 1 on any Defense Dice, after this Attack is completed, they become **Panicked**.
This model counts as your Commander's unit for all abilities and effects.
Defender may not use Orders or be targeted by friendly Tactics Cards until the end of the Turn.
This unit deploys with 1 Pillage Token and may always re-roll any Attack Dice.
